title: How does one measure their reading speed? - Quora

response.answer_text: No need for any software, app or website… How to measure your reading speed using a book and a timer: Set the timer for 3 minutesStart to read the bookStop reading when the timer stops after 3 minutesCount the number of words in total:Count the number of words of one lineMultiply this amount with the number of linesDivide the total number of words with 3The result is your reading speed in wpm (words per minute)e.g. You read 73 lines with approx. 7 words per line in 3 minutes: Your reading speed is 170 wpm.

You can easily find out your reading speed on this link. It gives speed in terms of words per minute. How Long to Read You can check your speed as well as comprehension on this site: Free Speed Reading Test by AceReader
